posts.title: Miss You - missed connections
posts.body: J,I am missing you today. I miss you every day.Yours...

posts.title: the cute couple at the bar - missed connections
posts.body: We were checking each other out, and there was a spark, we were just afraid to talk about it.  If you are still thinking about it, respond.  Please send a pic and/or tell me which bar.

posts.title: to the girl at the drive thru in struthers today - missed connections
posts.body: when i went there, i asked for a large red bull and a lighter. i didn't notice the lighter had a picture of a shark and the words kiss me on it until i got home. i am now curious if you handed me that specific lighter with the words kiss me on it as a hint/message you are interested in me and was trying to get my attention. if so, respond to this message, along with the color of my car if you remember.
